dmca.title: Copyright Infringement by gdstudio.org
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Klages [mailto:kenklages@bigplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, October 22, 2004 5:14 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement by gdstudio.org

 

Date: October 22, 2004

 

To:    Lance Crosby, Esq.

        COO of theplanet.com

        1333 Stemmons Fwy. Suite 110

        Dallas, TX 75027

        214.782.7800   Fax:  214.782.7801

 

From:   Ken Klages - owner

            KlagesWebDesign.com

            684 Woodbine Dr.

            San Rafael, CA 94903

            415-472-2691

 

Re: Copyright Infringement by one of your clients -  gdstudio.org

 

One of your hosting web sites has completely stolen all of it's web site
content from my web site.  In addition, this customer of yours appears to
running an illegal spamming operation and I very unhappy to have my client
testimonials being stolen to bolster credibility of these devious
individuals.  

 

Your client who has stolen my work, according to the Whois for the domain
name,  is:

Registrant Name:Serge Riabchuck
Registrant Organization:-
Registrant Street1:Le Quesne Chambers
Registrant Street2:9 Burrard Street
Registrant Street3:
Registrant City:St Heiler
Registrant State/Province:
Registrant Postal Code:JE24WS
Registrant Country:GB
Registrant Phone:+380.503579722

I received two emails from people in Great Britain who discovered that his
supposed clients were actually MY clients and that he has completely stolen
and copied my web site and claimed my work as his.

 

Here is a copy of the spam he is sending out:

 

Our firm is engaged in manufacturing of sites worldwide. Now we have many
clients from UK. Majority of the clients is convenient to pay us for our
work by computer not leaving from the house. Therefore assistants in our
business  are necessary for us. We are ready to pay money for the work of
our assistants  because they help us to earn money. Our firm offers you to
take part in our business and to earn good money.  If you have some free
hours per day, if you are interested with additional  earnings 2000-3000 GBP
per week, if you not less than 21 years, if you are responsible  and
executive - we invite you to take part in our business! 

Your work will consist  in acceptance of payments from our customers and
sending money to our agents.  Your salary will be 8 % from all sums received
by you. Your activity is absolutely  legal. After signing the contract with
our company our managers brings you to the  list of the permanent members of
staff, we pay the taxes for your activity. 

If you are interested with our offer and you are ready to try your forces in
new business - Write us on our e-mail  <mailto:webdestudio@aol.com>
webdestudio@aol.com. Our official website   <outbind://210/www.gdstudio.org>
www.gdstudio.org, fax 39-02-954-41-161

I hope to see you in our team soon! 

WebDStudio Director Roberto Cablann

The content he has stolen from my site is as follows:

 

Copyrighted material on klageswebdesign.com               Stolen & copied
directly to his pages:

 

http://www.klageswebdesign.com/index.htm
http://www.gdstudio.org/

http://www.klageswebdesign.com/about.htm
http://www.gdstudio.org/about.htm (stole my 1st 3 paragraphs)

http://www.klageswebdesign.com/testimonials.htm
http://www.gdstudio.org/test.htm

http://www.klageswebdesign.com/why.htm
http://www.gdstudio.org/who.htm

 

 

That is every page of his site which a word-for-word copy of my content (He
did replace my name with his on the about.htm page, but didn't even bother
to change anything else!)  The only other page of his site is port.htm which
he stole from a html template web site.

 

Please shut down this web site and please do not do business with this
spammer / phisher in the future.  I am sure you do not want this type of
undesirable client for your business, so your help is greatly appreciated.

 

 

Best Wishes,

Ken Klages

Klages Web Design

415-472-2691  Fax: 415-472-0905

ken@klageswebdesign.com

Please visit my web site at:

www.klageswebdesign.com <http://www.klageswebdesign.com/>
